DOC.brief_summary: This study evaluate safety , tolerability efficacy BFH772 12 week treatment compare active control vehicle patient erythemato-telangiectatic rosacea .
DOC.brief_title: Safety , Tolerability Efficacy BFH772 Rosacea Patients
DOC.criteria: Have persistent facial erythema cheek least moderate severity . Women must able bear child Have 12 inflammatory lesion face Previous treatment facial skin laser electrocauterisation within 2 month prior enter study Have facial hair make difficult evaluate rosacea face Other protocoldefined inclusion/exclusion criterion may apply
